author: demiurgos_23
content: is there any way to subscribe to a certain EIP-RFC so we get notified of changes ? seems like a good thing to have

author: demiurgos_23
content: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788 why was opcode value `0x48` chosen ?

author: ralexstokes
content: 0x4 to group w/ similar opcodes, although it looks like 0x48 is for `basefee` so this should be updated for `0x49`
